prompt:
Analyze the command architecture in /Users/alexkamysz/AI/scout_plan_build_mvp focusing on:

SLASH COMMANDS (.claude/commands/):
- scout.md and scout_improved.md
- plan_w_docs.md and plan_w_docs_improved.md
- scout_plan_build.md and scout_plan_build_improved.md
- build_adw.md
- Other command patterns

AGENT COORDINATION:
- How agents are spawned (Task tool usage)
- Parallel vs sequential execution
- Timeout mechanisms (3-minute limits)
- Error handling and recovery
- Output aggregation patterns

VARIABLE FLOW:
- How data passes between commands
- Input/output contracts
- File path conventions
- JSON schema structures

SAFETY MECHANISMS:
- Git operations (diff, reset)
- Validation gates
- Rollback procedures
- Hook integrations

IMPROVEMENTS:
- What changed in _improved.md versions
- Best practices implemented
- Performance optimizations

Format as structured markdown.
